TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TextBox extends System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler
Public Class TextBox Inherits TextControl Implements IPostBackDataHandler
type TextBox = class inherit TextControl interface IPostBackDataHandler

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 提供可讓使用者輸入文字的文字型控制項。

span.span: Provides a text-based control that allows the user to enter text.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 允許只是單行文字輸入。The allows only single-line text input. 此控制項也會實作介面; 它可以接受輸入，並產生回傳。This control also implements the interface; it can accept input and generate postbacks. 使用 WML 裝置，不過，輸入的資料可能不會回傳至伺服器。With devices using WML, however, entered data might not post back to the server. 當使用者在文字方塊中輸入值時，這些值會儲存在屬性，它繼承自基底類別。When the user enters values in a text box, the values are stored in the property, which is inherited from the base class. > [!NOTE] > A接受使用者輸入，也就是潛在的安全性威脅。A accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Mobile Web Form 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Mobile Web Forms pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).

permission.span: 用於裝載環境中的作業。

span.span: for operating in a hosted environment.
Demand value: ; Permission value: .
Introduction to the TextBox Control

span.span: if the control's state has changed as a result of the postback; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會先嘗試呼叫方法所參考物件。The method first attempts to call the method on the object referenced by . 如果配接器有沒有載入控制項的張貼資料的裝置特定實作，該呼叫會傳回`false`而方法接著會測試所參考之物件的值`data`參數中指定`key`針對。If the adapter has no device-specific implementation for loading the post data into the control, that call returns `false` and the method then tests the value of the object referenced by the `data` parameter at the specified `key` against . 如果值不相等，則會設定新的值。If the values are not equal, the new value is set. 如果其中一個要載入張貼的資料，不論是透過介面卡或直接變更，資料會導致就會發生。If either attempt to load the posted data, whether through the adapter or directly, results in the data being changed, a will occur.

span.span: The default value is 0, meaning that there is no limit on the length.

The value is less than zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 並非所有的標記語言支援使用使用者完全輸入數值。Not all markup languages support the use of fully numeric user input. 例如，HTML 不支援這個屬性。For example, HTML does not support this property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設實作會引發事件。The default implementation raises the event. 繼承的類別可以覆寫這個方法，以文字變更時執行其他工作。Inheriting classes can override this method to perform other tasks when the text is changed.

span.span: if the input must be treated as a password; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 星號會是一般字元，用來遮罩密碼。An asterisk is a typical character that is used to mask a password. > [!NOTE] > 設定屬性設為 true 不會加密或否則在傳輸過程中保護密碼字串。Setting the property to true does not encrypt or otherwise protect the password string during transmission.

summary.span: 取得或設定所指定之文字方塊應有的長度 (以字元數為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the expected length of the specified text box, in characters.

summary.span: 文字方塊大小的預設值為 0，表示瀏覽器會使用其預設的文字方塊長度。

span.span: The default value for the size of a text box is 0, which means that the browser will use its default text box length.

span.span: The expected length of the specified text box, in characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項資訊不用來執行驗證檢查實際輸入的值。This information is not used to perform validation checks against the actual input value. 若要執行的輸入值的驗證檢查，使用的驗證程式控制項或屬性。To perform a validation check against an input value, use the validator controls or the property. 這項資訊會決定呈現行為。This information does determine the rendering behavior. 例如，這個屬性的值可協助判斷要在 HTML 中的輸入的文字方塊大小。For example, the value of this property helps determine how large to make an input text box in HTML.

span.span: The value is less than zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者變更的文字，不會立即引發此事件。When the user changes the text of a , this event is not raised immediately. 此表單必須包含以啟始回傳事件引發事件。The form must contain a to initiate a postback event that raises the event. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用事件來變更中的項目。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to change the items in a .
